thread.title: BRIEF-CVB Financial And Community Bank Announce Agreement To Merge

title: BRIEF-CVB Financial And Community Bank Announce Agreement To Merge

organizations.name: cvb financial and community bank announce agreement to merge reuters

text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - CVB Financial Corp:
* CVB AND COMMUNITY BANK ANNOUNCE AGREEMENT TO MERGE * ‍ENTERED INTO AN AGREEMENT PURSUANT TO WHICH COMMUNITY WILL MERGE WITH AND INTO CITIZENS IN A STOCK AND CASH TRANSACTION ​
* ‍STOCK AND CASH TRANSACTION VALUED AT APPROXIMATELY $878.3 MILLION, BASED ON CVBF‘S CLOSING STOCK PRICE OF $23.37 ON FEB 23
* ‍CVBF EXPECTS MERGER TO RESULT IN APPROXIMATELY 12% EARNINGS PER SHARE ACCRETION IN 2019, EXCLUDING ONE-TIME TRANSACTION COSTS​
* ‍AT CLOSING, MARSHALL V. LAITSCH, CHAIRMAN OF BOARD OF COMMUNITY, WILL JOIN BOARD OF CVBF​
* CVB FINANCIAL - ‍PURSUANT TO AGREEMENT, EACH SHARE OF COMMUNITY COMMON STOCK TO RECEIVE CONSIDERATION OF 9.4595 SHARES OF CO STOCK AND $56/SHARE IN CASH​
* ‍BOARDS OF DIRECTORS OF COMMUNITY, CVBF AND CITIZENS HAVE APPROVED PROPOSED MERGER​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
